page.title: 01INTRODUCTION
page.content: The nearest major towns to Biggin Hill are Croydon and Bromley. London is about twenty miles away. The coast is approximately one hours drive away. The countryside in our area is very lush. It is quiet and peaceful. The area is covered mostly by farmland, woodland and urban development. Some of the many interesting things around include Chartwell, Westerham village and St. Mark's Church. Canterbury is worth a visit taking about two hours drive from here to there. Tatsfield village is much smaller than Biggin Hill. It is a traditional village with a church and school. Some of the houses are built around a green with a pond.
